meanings.definition: Covered in or containing a large amount of grease.
meanings.sent1: The burger from that fast food place was the greasiest I've ever had.
meanings.sent2: After cooking bacon, the pan was always the greasiest item in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The greasiest pizza in town is so oily, it practically slides off the plate!
meanings.sent4: Her hair, slick with the greasiest conditioner, shone under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic's hands were the greasiest I had ever seen, leaving marks on everything he touched.

meanings.definition: Having the most grease compared to others.
meanings.sent1: Out of all the options, the greasiest fries were the ones from the diner down the street.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic always used the greasiest tools to get the job done quickly.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon's fur looked like the greasiest of them all after rummaging through the trash.
meanings.sent4: The old car engine sputtered, releasing the greasiest smoke into the air.
meanings.sent5: The greasiest hamburger at the fair left a trail of oil on the paper wrapper.

meanings.definition: Characterized by an excessive amount of grease.
meanings.sent1: The greasiest foods tend to be the least healthy choices on the menu.
meanings.sent2: His face glistened with sweat, looking like the greasiest surface imaginable.
meanings.sent3: The greasiest handshake I ever received left my palm feeling slippery for hours.
meanings.sent4: The greasiest part of the story was when the character slipped on the oily floor.
meanings.sent5: The greasiest spot on the road caused the car to skid dangerously out of control.
